name: Captain Firehawk and the Laser Love Situation
storyline: When enormous, size-morphing vixens begin attacking planets throughout the galaxy, only one man is able to stand against them and put things right- a pizza guy with a pilot's license: Captain Firehawk. He must rely on his wits, reflexes, and retro gaming skills in order to take down these dastardly damsels and save the day!
summary: A shoot-em-up of macro proportions! When size-morphing alien girls decide to attack the world, only one man is able to stand against them and put things right- a pizza guy with a pilot's license.
